name: Frozen World
description:
A tiny 2 minute narrative adventure made in 3 week as a student project. It was intended to be much larger, but 3 weeks is 3 weeks, and I ended up focusing on a small, polished section of the game.

It tells a small snippet of a much larger story - one that I will hopefully get to tell one day. See if you can piece together what's happening!

This project makes use of free (or free to use) art assets from this very site, as well as some others:

Character by Rvros
https://rvros.itch.io/animated-pixel-hero

Environment by Ansimuz
https://ansimuz.itch.io/gothicvania-interiors / www.ansimuz.com

Enemy by Stephen "Redshrike" Challener, MrBeast, Surt, Blarumyrran, Sharm, Zabin
https://opengameart.org/content/rpg-enemies-11-dragons

Music:  "The Escalation" by Kevin Macleod
https://incompetech.com/wordpress/2014/10/the-escalation/

Sounds from various artists at https://freesound.org/, full details included in the download.
